commodities.tests.technical
Class MovingAverage

java.lang.Object
  commodities.tests.technical.MovingAverage
Direct Known Subclasses:
MovingAverageExponential, MovingAverageTriangle
public class MovingAverage
extends Object

MovingAverage calculates the moving average on a set of data. The sourceMap that is passed to MovingAverage must be of date/Double values in ascending order by date. MovingAverage will then traverse the sourceMap to determine the moving average for a given date or for the entire range.

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.11
